name: React Native Essentials
description: Master the fundamental concepts of React Native development.

syllabus.content: Overview of React Native, setting up your development environment.
Creating a simple mobile app using React Native components.
Understanding state management in React Native applications.
Connecting your React Native app to external APIs.
Implementing navigation and routing in your mobile app.
Exploring advanced concepts and best practices in React Native development.

name: Javascript Project Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop to apply React Native concepts in a real-world project.

syllabus.content: Introduction to the project and defining project goals.
Designing the user interface for your React Native project.
Exploring different state management strategies in React Native.
Integrating APIs and handling data in your React Native project.
Learn effective testing and debugging techniques for React Native applications.
Presenting and showcasing your React Native project to the class.

name: React Native for Beginners
description: A beginner-friendly course to kickstart your journey into React Native development.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS

syllabus.content: Introduction to React Native and setting up your first project.
Exploring styling options and components in React Native.
Understanding state and props in React Native applications.
Implementing forms and handling user input in React Native.
Exploring the lifecycle of React Native components.
Applying learned concepts to build a small React Native project.

name: Mobile App Design Principles
description: Explore the fundamental principles of designing user-friendly mobile applications.

syllabus.content: Understanding the principles of mobile application design.
Exploring UX design practices for mobile apps.
Designing accessible interfaces for mobile applications.
Creating prototypes and conducting usability testing.
Applying material design principles to mobile app interfaces.
Applying design principles to a real-world mobile app project.

name: Mobile App Testing Techniques
description: Learn effective testing techniques for ensuring the quality of your mobile applications.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of mobile app development

syllabus.content: Overview of mobile app testing and its importance.
Creating prototypes and conducting usability testing.
Applying material design principles to mobile app interfaces.
Applying design principles to a real-world mobile app project.

name: python for Beginners
description: A beginner-friendly course to kickstart your journey into  python development.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS

syllabus.content: Introduction to React Native and setting up your first project.
Exploring styling options and components in React Native.
Understanding state and props in React Native applications.
Implementing forms and handling user input in React Native.
Exploring the lifecycle of React Native components.
Applying learned concepts to build a small React Native project.
